name: Woodland Warfare
description:
This is chess but with limited resources, your tree can spend sap to summon units to the battlefield and use it to command them to move or attack. But beware! The lower your sap, the more vulnerable your tree is. If it gets to 0 you lose!

Instructions

Every action you do (moving, summoning or attacking) consumes your sap life, recover it by conquering new tiles or killing enemy troops.

Take on your enemy tree when is weak on Sap to win.

Made for Ludum Dare 44 “Your life is your currency”

Programming by:

  • Kichex

Art by:

  • Prideling
  • Zapatak.Art

Music:

"Unholy Knight" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
